name: AddCandidateTag
description:
Add a tag to a candidate in the recruitment system.

Use this tool to attach a specific tag to a candidate in the Ashby recruitment platform, which helps in categorizing and managing candidates efficiently.

parameters.name: candidate_tag_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing `candidateId` and `tagId`. Used to specify which candidate to tag and which tag to apply.

candidateId.description: The unique id of the candidate to add the tag to.

tagId.description: The unique id of the tag to add to the candidate.
